entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
